channel.title: Axoloti & Sonic Pi (and more...)
channel.description:
For some time I have been concentrating on the sequencing/composing side of music. That is, what notes follow the initial silence? After doing research in duo and group improv I concentrated on music software. I feel most comfortable with the Sonic Pi software, which I do ocassionally combine with the Axoloti (thanks to @maceq687 for the cool Generator 259 patch!)
Read on here: http://www.phyla.info/?p=2673
